sourcesContent:
import {Box, Typography, Container, Card, Divider, Skeleton} from '@mui/material';
import '../scss/PostPage.scss';
import React, { useEffect } from 'react'
import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom';


const PostPage = (props) => {

  const {id} = useParams();

  return (
    <Container>
      <Box className='post-page-area'>
        <Card
          component='div'
          className='post-page-card'
        >
          { //만약 props.post[id]의 값이 있으면
            props.posts[id] ?
            (
              <Box sx={{
                padding : '30px',
                transition : 'all 1s'
              }}>
                <Typography
                  variant='subtitle2'
                  className='post-page-date'
                >
                  {props.posts[id].submitDate}
                </Typography>
                <Typography
                  variant='h3'
                  className='post-page-title'
                >
                  {props.posts[id].title}
                </Typography>
                <Divider />
                <Box variant='div' component='div' className='post-page-content' dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html : props.posts[id].contents }} />
              </Box>
            )
            : 
            (
              <Box sx={{
                padding : '30px',
              }}>
                <Typography
                  variant='subtitle2'
                  className='post-page-date'
                >
                  <Skeleton variant="rounded" width={210} height={100} />
                </Typography>
                <Typography
                  variant='h3'
                  className='post-page-title'
                >
                </Typography>
                <Divider />
                <Box variant='div' component='div' className='post-page-content'>
                  dd
                </Box>
              </Box>
            )
          }
        </Card>
      </Box>
    </Container>
  )
}

export default PostPage;
